title: Computer-Based and Hands-On Activity Design for Understanding Electric Circuit Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical terminology (resistance, voltage, current)
context.additional_context: Blended learning design using smartphones and simple experiment kits in constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Students can apply Ohm's Law to solve simple circuit problems
Students can analyze electrical circuit components through computer simulations and hands-on experiments
Students can design three types of circuits (series, parallel, and mixed) based on learned content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
